categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Imperial Navy personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kilit Four was the callsign of a pilot in the Kilit Squadron of the Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia the squadron participated in the attack on the Coronet City's Aegis Base, during which Kilit Four started losing starfighter engine power and was ordered to return to base lest he got shot down like Kilit Three.
